title: Mozilla Firefox 117 Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New
description:
Firefox 117 web browser is now available for download featuring a built-in and automatic translation feature for websites, as well as many other changes.

The post Mozilla Firefox 117 Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: GNU Linux-Libre 6.5 Kernel Released for Those Seeking 100% Freedom for Their PCs
description:
GNU Linux-Libre 6.5 kernel is now available for download. This release is based on Linux kernel 6.5 and it’s targeted at those who seek 100% freedom for their personal computers.

The post GNU Linux-Libre 6.5 Kernel Released for Those Seeking 100% Freedom for Their PCs appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
